news_header: Actress Jenna Fischer reveals she is cancer-free after treatment for breast cancer and encourages others to get checked.
news_text: Jenna Fischer, known for her role as Pam Beesly in The Office, announced on Instagram that she has been undergoing treatment for breast cancer since December. After surgery and multiple rounds of chemotherapy and radiation, she is now cancer-free. Jenna shared her experience to encourage others to check for signs of breast cancer, emphasizing the importance of early detection. Her cancer was discovered during a routine scan in October 2023, leading to a diagnosis of stage 1 triple positive breast cancer. She highlighted the support she received from friends and co-stars during her treatment and urged women to get regular check-ups, noting that her tumor was too small to be felt during a physical exam.
